docs.snippet: Uruguay striker Luis Suarez could be suspended from the World Cup for the second successive tournament after he appeared to bite Italy's Giorgio Chiellini on the shoulder during his team's 1-0 win on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay striker Luis Suarez could be suspended from the World Cup for the second successive tournament after he appeared to bite Italy's Giorgio Chiellini on the shoulder during his team's 1-0 win on Tuesday.

docs.snippet: After one final frustrating game in Brazil, England's players can finally fly home. The Motherland of Football's most humiliating experience at a World Cup is over, and the grieving process — as coach Roy Hodgson sees it — and the inqu...
docs.lead_paragraph: After one final frustrating game in Brazil, England's players can finally fly home. The Motherland of Football's most humiliating experience at a World Cup is over, and the grieving process — as coach Roy Hodgson sees it — and the inquest can continue in England.

headline.main: England Flies Home From World Cup Winless
headline.print_headline: England Flies Home From World Cup Winless
